version_description:
*** Elected as one of the "Best Apps of 2016" by Apple's App Store! ***

Hi everyone! We have a great new feature exploring the AR world with the new iOS11... Virtual Gallery!
Build your own art gallery and see your artworks in the real world!

We hope you enjoy it!

Colorfy team

*** Elected as one of the "Best Apps of 2016" by Apple's App Store! ***

Hi everyone! We have a great new feature exploring the AR world with the new iOS11... Virtual Gallery!
Build your own art gallery and see your artworks in the real world!

We hope you enjoy it!

Colorfy team

*** Elected as one of the "Best Apps of 2016" by Apple's App Store! ***

Hi everyone! Get ready to our biggest update ever, we bring you... the all new Colorfy UI! Check it out:

~ Brand new design, with relaxing visual and smooth transitions
~ New Library: Easily explore the vast collection of images!
~ New Canvas: Run through the new color wheel to browse amazing palettes!

We hope you enjoy!
Colorfy team

*** Elected as one of the "Best Apps of 2016" by Apple's App Store! ***

Hi everyone! Get ready to our biggest update ever, we bring you... the all new Colorfy UI! Check it out:

~ Brand new design, with relaxing visual and smooth transitions
~ New Library: Easily explore the vast collection of images!
~ New Canvas: Run through the new color wheel to browse amazing palettes!

We hope you enjoy!
Colorfy team

Hi everyone!

Thanks to your feedback, we have fixed a few bugs which appeared in the previous version. Also, we have:
~ Made it easier to find black and white by including it in the grey palette and in the basic palette
~ Re-included the possibility to change the angle and direction of gradientes; just tap in the gradients icon repeatedly

We are still working in a few additional changes, especially the re-inclusion of the palette create feature. Keep tuned!

your feedback is really important to us, please let us know your comments and suggestions by sending a message to our Facebook page.

Happy Coloring!

--
Colorfy Team

The re-designed palette create feature is finally here! Create your own palettes with infinite possibilities!

Your feedback is really important to us, please let us know your comments and suggestions by sending a message to our Facebook page.

Happy Coloring!

--
Colorfy Team
+ Minor bug fixes

The re-designed palette create feature is finally here! Create your own palettes with infinite possibilities!

Your feedback is really important to us, please let us know your comments and suggestions by sending a message to our Facebook page.

Happy Coloring!

--
Colorfy Team
+ Minor bug fixes

*** Elected as one of the "Best Apps of 2016" by Apple's App Store! ***

This update is out to improve Colorfy's performance, providing you a happier experience while coloring!

Team Colorfy
+ Minor bug fixes

Hi everyone!

On this update we bring you a cool new feature: Timelapse! Now, after finishing coloring, you can watch your art piece come to life and share it with your friends!

We hope you enjoy it!

Happy Coloring!

--
Colorfy Team
修复小错误

Hi everyone!

On this update we bring you a cool new feature: Timelapse! Now, after finishing coloring, you can watch your art piece come to life and share it with your friends!

We hope you enjoy it!

Happy Coloring!

--
Colorfy Team
+ Minor bug fixes
+ Minor bug fixes
修复小错误

Hi all! In this update we bring you an amazing new feature: Fingerpaint mode!
 
~ Color your imported pictures in a whole different way and get amazing realistic results!
 ~ Give a special touch to your favorite Colorfy images! 

Happy Coloring!

--
Colorfy Team
Minor bug fixes

minor bug fixes.

We update Colorfy regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements!

-New images!
-Battery usage optimization
